title: (4353) Architect Designed Brand New 2 Storied House Available for Sale in Highly Residential Area, Thalawathugoda,
details: Architect Designed Brand New 2 Storied House Available for Sale in Highly Residential Area, Thalawathugoda, 10 Perches Land extent, 05 Rooms, 4 Bathrooms, Toto fittings and Granite tops. 3 Phase electricity, Pipeline Water With overhead Tank, Pressure Pump, Hot Water, Pantry Cupboards With Granite tops Remote Control Gate Parking for 2 Vehicles Servant Room and Bathrooms front and back Landscape Garden. Rs : 385 (Negotiable) 385 Million
